pages.text: 89|24|‘‘en valkkaiyil nan (oru) nanmaiyaic ceytu vaittirukka ventume!'' Enru pulampuvan
89|25|annalil (pavikalai) avan ceyyum vetanaiyaip pol marrevanum (evaraiyum) ceyyamattan. (Avvalavu katinamaka avan vetanai ceyvan)
89|26|(pavikalai) avan kattuvataippol palamaka marra evanume kattamattan. (Avvalavu palamaka avan kattuvan)
89|27|(eninum, annalil nalla manitanai nokki) “nim'matiperra atmave
89|28|ni (iraivanaik kontu) tiruptiyataintataka! (Iraivanal ni) tirupti kollappattataka un iraivan pakkam tirumpac cel!'' (Enrum)
89|29|‘‘ni en nallatiyarkalil cerntu
89|30|en corkkattilum ni nulaintuvitu'' (enrum kuruvan)
90|1|(napiye! Apayamalikkum) innakarattin mitu cattiyam ceykiren
90|2|atilum nir innakarattil tankakkutiya camayattil
90|3|(manitarkalin) tantai mitum, avar perretutta cantatikal mitum cattiyamaka
90|4|meyyakave nam manitanai ciramattil mulkiyavanakave pataittirukkirom
90|5|(avvarirukka,) avan tannai atakka evaralum mutiyatu enru ennik kontana
90|6|‘‘eralamana porulai nan (campatittuc celavu ceytu) alittuvitten'' enru, avan (karvam kontu perumaiyakak) kurukiran
90|7|avvalavu porulai oruvarume parttirukkavillai enru avan ennik kontano
90|8|(Parkkakkutiya) iru kankalaiyum, nam avanukkuk kotukkavillaiya? (Avvariruntum unmaiyai avan kantukollavillai)
90|9|(pecakkutiya) oru navaiyum, iru utatukalaiyum (nam avanukkuk kotukkavillaiya? Atait tanakave avan ataintuvittana)
90|10|(nanmai timaiyin) iru valikalaiyum nam avanukkup pirittarivittom
90|11|eninum, (ituvarai) avan ‘akapa'vai (kanavayai)k katakkavillai
90|12|(napiye!) ‘Akapa' ennavenru nir arivira
90|13|atutan or atimaiyai vitutalai ceyvatu
90|14|allatu, uravinarkalil ulla or anataikko allatu katinamana varumaiyutaiya (mannaik kavvik kitakkum) or elaikko paciyutaiya (panca) nalil unavu alippatakum
90|15|allatu, uravinarkalil ulla or anataikko allatu katinamana varumaiyutaiya (mannaik kavvik kitakkum) or elaikko paciyutaiya (panca) nalil unavu alippatakum
90|16|allatu, uravinarkalil ulla or anataikko allatu katinamana varumaiyutaiya (mannaik kavvik kitakkum) or elaikko paciyutaiya (panca) nalil unavu alippatakum

90|17|piraku, evarkal nampikkai kontum oruvarukkoruvar porumaiyaik kataipitikkumaru nallupatecam ceytukontum, karunai kattaventum enru oruvarukkoruvar nallupatecam ceytukontum irukkirarkalo avarkalilum avar cerntuvituvar
90|18|ivarkaltan valatu pakkattil iruppavarkal
90|19|evarkal nam vacanankalai nirakarikkirarkalo, avarkaltan itappakkattil iruppavarkal
90|20|avarkalai narakattil pottu (ella valikalum) mutappattuvitum
